0005000010172A00.name: Crunchyroll
0005000010172A00.description: Crunchyroll is the official destination for the largest lineup of current and classic Anime & Manga. Watch hit shows like Naruto Shippuden, One Piece, and Sword Art Online on all your favorite devices. Watch for free or become a Premium member to watch ad-free with exclusive access to simulcasts—your favorite shows available as soon as 1 hour after they air in Japan. Visit www.crunchyroll.com/wiiu for more details. Subscription required. Subject to availability in your region.

00050000101C4D00.name: Xenoblade Chronicles™ X
00050000101C4D00.description: Earth has fallen. Yet mankind endures, taking to the stars and crash-landing on an alien world in a desperate attempt to escape. Defend the survivors using high-tech weaponry on a mission to rebuild humanity. Suit up in heavily armed mechs to tame the wilds of planet Mira and beat back the hostile forces threatening to obliterate the human race. All of civilization faces annihilation from an intergalactic war between two alien races. Battle powerful creatures using a real-time combat system that is filled with tactical options. Tailor your character and mech to showcase your individuality and strength. Then equip them with customized weapons to dominate real-time battles. Conquer a huge world, and forge new friendships with alien beings. Stand together or fall. Humanity’s fate rests, like a sword, in your hand. The Xenoblade Chronicles X game can only be purchased as a digital download in the U.S., Canada and Mexico. Availability of the game in packaged form varies by country. DLC is only usable when added to the full version of the game.

0005000010105A00.name: Netflix
0005000010105A00.description: With this free software, you can instantly watch TV shows and movies streaming from Netflix. For Netflix members, it's part of your unlimited streaming membership. Not a Netflix member? You can start a FREE trial today. Watch as often as you want. Whenever you want. Subscription required. Subject to availability in your region.

0005000010105700.name: YouTube
0005000010105700.description: Discover and watch your favorite videos and channels on YouTube!

00050000101C6200.name: Mini Mario & Friends amiibo Challenge
00050000101C6200.description: Make minis march like never before in this free download. Tap an amiibo™ figure to guide 1 of 11 minis across more than 50 levels. Use minis and their unique abilities, like Yoshi™ who can eat enemies or Rosalina who launches to high places, to reach the exit. But watch out! Mine carts, ghostly Boos and other new obstacles lurk around every corner. To get started, simply tap any compatible amiibo figure on the Wii U™ GamePad controller. Or, by tapping specific amiibo figures, you can guide minis that have their own unique abilities and exclusive sets of levels. These specially designed, character-themed levels include their own look, remixed music and obstacles for you to master, which comes in handy the more you play. Earn in-game amiibo tokens with different minis to unlock even more difficult challenges.

0005000010176900.name: Splatoon™
0005000010176900.description: Splatter enemies and claim your turf as ink-spraying, squid-like Inklings in Nintendo's ultimate messfest! Compete online in chaotic four-on-four turf wars, and unleash squid powers to ink your way to victory. Rank up in online battles to unlock new weapons and fresh gear for your Inkling, complete with unique gameplay perks! May the best mess win. Fresh content: New modes, maps, gear, and more are rolling out regularly throughout summer 2015, so there’s always something new to try out! Team matchmaking and more: Team up with friends and hone your strategy together in online team modes. Create your own squid squad of up to four friends in Squad Battle, or choose your own map and rules, and play with up to seven of your friends in Private Battle. Or go solo and get matched with other players around the world in 4 vs. 4 battles that let you level up or boost your rank. However you play, there's no time to blink—prepare to ink! Check out the theme inspired by this game in the Nintendo 3DS Theme Shop*. Just tap the icon in the upper left corner of your Nintendo 3DS* HOME Menu to get started. *Theme compatible on Nintendo 3DS family of systems. Systems and themes sold separately.

00050000101D6B00.name: Splatoon™ Testfire
00050000101D6B00.description: The Splatoon Summer Splatdown is back! To celebrate the final days of summer vacation, we're offering a special chance to get your feet wet in the Splatoon Testfire demo! Jump online and fight it out in fast and furious 4-on-4 Turf War battles! This free demo event will only be active during a few short time periods between 8/25 and 8/28. Don’t miss this free chance to get inked! You'll need a broadband Internet connection to participate in the Splatoon Testfire demo. To join, download the free Splatoon Testfire special demo from Nintendo eShop for Wii U, and then launch the demo during one of the designated time periods! Event times (You can only play during these time periods) 8/25 (Thu) 3:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. PT 8/26 (Fri) 3:00 p.m. - 5:00 p.m. PT 8/27 (Sat) 3:00 p.m. - 5:00 p.m. PT 8/28 (Sun) 3:00 p.m. - 5:00 p.m. PT

000500001017E300.name: Splatoon™ Global Testfire
000500001017E300.description: THIS JUST IN! The Splatoon™ Global Testfire is returning for one final splatterrific round! Did you miss out on the first Splatoon Global Testfire special demo? To celebrate the upcoming release of the Splatoon game on 5/29, players around the world can jump online* and fight it out in fast and furious 4-on-4 Turf War battles! Players will have a single hour to test their skills, starting at 3:00 p.m. PT on Saturday, 5/23. You'll need a broadband Internet connection to participate. To join, download the free Splatoon Global Testfire special demo from Nintendo eShop for Wii U, and then launch the demo during the designated time period! This Testfire will feature the same weapons and stages from the first Testfire event. If you missed the first event, don’t miss this final chance to get inked before launch! Event time (You can only play during this time period) 5/23 (Sat) 3:00 p.m. - 4:00 p.m. PT *Broadband Internet access required for online features. For more info, go to support.nintendo.com

000500001014CA00.name: The Legend of Zelda™: Hyrule Historia
000500001014CA00.description: The Legend of Zelda™ franchise has set the industry for riveting game play and immersive story lines. With each game the player discovered a story of destinies intertwined and heroes emerging from humble beginnings to overcome the most impossible of odds. Now, take an in-depth look at the creation of one of the most beloved gaming franchises of all time. Containing never-before-seen concept art, character designs, the official chronology of the games, the history of Hyrule, and much more!
